titles.title: AIR Safety Act of 2020
Aerial Incursion Repercussion Safety Act of 2020
AIR Safety Act of 2020
A bill to direct the Director of the Bureau of Land Management to study the effects of drone incursions on wildfire suppression, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Aerial Incursion Repercussion Safety Act of 2020 or the AIR Safety Act of 2020
This bill directs the Forest Service to study the effects of drone incursions on wildfire suppression concerning lands managed by the Department of the Interior or the Department of Agriculture.
